item.title: 25 Most Anticipated Movies Of 2025
item.description: 2025 has plenty of exciting films to offer with Mission: Impossible, DC, Marvel, Avatar, and more returning. Here are our 25 most anticipated movies.

item.title: 25 Years After His Phantom Menace Death, Darth Maul Officially Has More Screentime Than Darth Vader
item.description: Darth Vader and Darth Maul are both iconic Star Wars villains, but Maul actually has the most screen time, even though he died in his first film.

item.title: Nobody Will Ever Top This Perfect Scarlet Witch Cosplay Using The Cosplayer's Real Burned Down House
item.description: This truly impressive Scarlet Witch cosplay featuring the cosplayers own burned down house likely wonâ€™t be topped anytime soon, for good reason.
